name: Bike Stunt: Xtreme Master
description:
Bike Stunt: Xtreme Master is a new and exciting physics based motocross bike stunt game. Turn the key and start your bike, pull the stifle and push for enjoy life to wrapper on the bike ride of you. The bike stunt Trail racing fever has a realistic bike stunt and real bike physics dangerous tricky path trail track.
Features
30 challenging levels
A real Life stunt bike Simulation
Perfect & Realistic bike Controls
Free career and level Mode
Obstacles to avoid
Realistic & Stunning Environment
